activities: Pinger uses personal information received from the EU/EEA and/or Switzerland to enable end users to communicate with others through our mobile applications.  End users provide an email address and name when establishing an account with Pinger.  For some Pinger products, end users may also provide address and billing information. End users may also provide personal information to Pinger when contacting our support operations.  Pinger only uses personal information as directed by or agreed to by the end user.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Mobile app data, Online data. Does not include manually processed data.
